string.text: Bundle of Paper

A bundle of slightly yellowed papers, bound together with a simple twine. The pages vary in size and thickness, indicating a collection of old forms, letters, and notes. Some sheets are marked with faded ink, hinting at their age and previous use. Perfect for kindling or note-taking, this bundle adds a touch of authenticity to any makeshift hideout. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Kitchen Cabinets

A set of sturdy, wooden kitchen cabinets with a distinctly Soviet-era design. The faded, once-white paint reveals the wooden texture underneath, and the handles are slightly rusted but functional. Inside, the shelves are spacious enough to store food supplies, utensils, and other essentials. Despite their age, these cabinets provide reliable storage and add a nostalgic charm to any hideout kitchen. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Ash Tray

An ash tray made of thick, durable glass with a simple, utilitarian design. The edges are slightly chipped, showing signs of prolonged use. The base is wide and stable, ensuring it won't easily tip over. Ideal for any hideout where smokers gather, it keeps the space clean and adds a touch of lived-in authenticity. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Metal Barrel

A robust metal barrel, rusted at the seams but still solid. The barrel is standard size, once used for storing industrial materials. Its exterior shows signs of age and weather, but it remains a versatile storage option for fuel, water, or other supplies. A common sight in many makeshift hideouts and camps for reasons unknown. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Bathroom Shelves

A set of metal bathroom shelves, coated in white enamel that's chipped in places. Each shelf is wide enough to hold toiletries, first-aid supplies, or small personal items. The structure is wall-mounted, saving floor space and adding to the efficient use of the area. Despite its worn appearance, it provides solid storage and organization in any hideout bathroom. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Billiard Table

An old, well-worn billiard table with faded green felt. The wood is scratched and dented from years of use, but the table remains sturdy and level. Pool cues and balls may be missing or mismatched, yet it serves as a great distraction and a way to pass time in the Zone. A rare luxury item for hideouts and faction camps. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Cooking Pot

A large, cast-iron cooking pot with a heavy lid. The pot's surface is blackened from countless fires, and the handle shows signs of frequent use. It's capacious enough for making soups or stews, making it a valuable item for any hideout. Despite its worn appearance, it is a core part to the makeshift kitchen. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Wooden Countertop

A sturdy wooden countertop, worn smooth by years of use. The surface is stained and scratched, bearing the marks of countless meals prepared. It offers ample space for food preparation and can double as a workspace. Despite its rough appearance, it remains a vital component of any functional kitchen in the Zone. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Cutting Board

A thick wooden cutting board, scarred all over with knife marks. The edges are rounded from years of use, and the surface has absorbed the oils and juices of countless meals. It's a basic but essential tool for any kitchen. Variants of different wood types are available. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Modern Chair

A sleek modern chair with a metal frame and plastic seat. The design is simple yet practical, offering comfortable seating. The chair shows some wear, with minor scratches on the plastic and slight rust on the metal parts. It provides reliable seating and adds a contemporary touch to any hideout's furnishings. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Table-Top Game

A classic board game set, complete with pieces and a foldable board. The box is worn and the edges are frayed, indicating many hours of play. Despite its age, the game appears to have all its pieces. Perfect for passing time and fostering camaraderie in any hideout. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Jerry Can

A metal jerry can, originally designed for military use. The exterior is dented and scratched, but it remains leak-proof and sturdy. Capable of holding up to 20 liters of fuel, it is commonly used for powering generators or vehicles. Its rugged design ensures it can withstand the harsh conditions of the Zone. Als makes for industrial decoration. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Target Practice Dummy

A metal dummy for target practice. The surface is pockmarked with bullet holes and worn down from exposure to the elements. It stands on a weighted base, providing stability during target practice. Essential for improving shooting accuracy and popular in military-adjacent faction bases for recurrent training. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Bidon

A large plastic bidon, typically used for storing water or other liquids. The body is translucent, allowing the contents to be easily monitored. Equipped with a sturdy handle and a secure screw-on lid, it's ideal for transporting and storing fluids.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Gas Tank

A large metal gas tank, typically used for storing propane or other flammable gases. The exterior is scratched and dented, with faded safety labels printed in Russian. Despite its weathered appearance, the tank can still be refilled and used. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Radio

A vintage radio with a wooden casing and metal accents. The knobs and dials show signs of wear, but the internals appear to be in good condition and the radio still turns on. Due to significant signal interference inside the exclusion zone, regular radio broadcasts can not be picked up under normal conditions. It adds a nostalgic touch to personal spaces in the Zone. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Picture Frame

A simple wooden picture frame, its surface slightly chipped and faded. The glass is intact, protecting the photograph or artwork within. Despite its plain design, it holds sentimental value and personalizes any space. A touch of humanity in the harsh environment of the Zone, it's a cherished decoration for many hideouts. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Acoustic Guitar

An acoustic guitar with a well-worn body and frayed strings. The wood has darkened with age, and the soundboard shows signs of repeated use. Despite its battered appearance, it still produces a rich, warm sound. A prized possession for any musician in the Zone, it offers a way to pass time and boost morale. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Stool

A simple wooden stool, its legs slightly wobbly from wear. The seat is round and smooth, showing the natural grain of the wood. It's lightweight and easy to move, making it a versatile seating option. Despite its basic construction, it's a functional and essential piece of furniture in any hideout. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Metal Table (Variant A)

A rectangular metal table with a utilitarian design. The surface is scratched and pitted, but it remains stable and durable. It's perfect for use as a workbench or for meal preparation. The table's sturdy construction ensures it can withstand heavy use in the demanding environment of the Zone. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Metal Table (Variant B)

A square metal table with reinforced legs and a slightly rusted surface. The design is robust and practical, suitable for a variety of uses. It can serve as a dining table, workbench, or general utility surface. Despite its weathered appearance, it remains a reliable and essential piece of furniture for any hideout. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Stalker Outfit Bundle

A bundle consisting of a well-worn common stalker outfit, including a jacket, sturdy pants, and a pair of boots. The clothing shows signs of extensive use with patches and repairs evident throughout. Laundry and cleaned pieces of equipment are a common sight in personal hideouts and faction camps. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[d_green] decoration item
Mercenary Outfit Bundle

A bundle of what used to be a mercenary outfit, complete with tactical vest, combat trousers, and high-quality boots. The gear is well-maintained, with minimal wear and tear. Laundry and cleaned pieces of equipment are a common sight in personal hideouts and faction camps. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Exoskeleton Bundle

A comprehensive exoskeleton bundle, including the powered frame, reinforced armor plates, and a control unit. The components show serious signs of use and damage to some of the components currently render it inoperable. Exoskeletons offer superior protection and strength enhancement to the user. Damaged parts like this are a common sight in workshops. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Stretcher

A basic stretcher with a canvas bed and metal handles. The canvas is stained and worn, showing signs of heavy use. Models like it are designed for emergency transport of injured individuals and commonly used in ambulances and hospitals. In the Zone, they are commonly found in faction camps with medical personnel and in some abandoned structures. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Gun Parts

A collection of miscellaneous gun parts, including barrels, triggers, various firing mechanisms, pistol grips, and even loose rounds, casings, and magazines. The parts are in varying conditions, some showing signs of rust, some have not been cleaned since they were collected. A common sight in firearms workshops and personal spaces of mechanics in the Zone. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Teapot

A metal teapot with a simple design. Its surface looks tarnished, probably from frequent use and some elemental exposure. The handle is wrapped in cloth to protect against heat. A useful tool for boiling water or making tea or coffee. A good addition to a kitchen space in a personal hideout. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Psy Protection Helmet

A non-functional psy helmet, originally designed to protect against psy emissions in the Zone. The helmet is bulky, with a series of electronic components and sensors embedded in its structure. It shows moderate signs of use, though the reasons behind its inoperability is unclear. May still make for an interesting piece of decoration. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Stack of Documents

A stack of various documents, including maps, notes, and reports. The papers are yellowed and some of them are dog-eared, suggesting some long-term use. In the hands of the right person, these documents may provide useful information and reference material. A typical find in the offices of military personnel and personal camps of experienced stalkers. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Personal Journal

A worn personal journal with a leather cover and yellowing pages. The pages are filled with handwritten notes, sketches, and observations, covering many days spent in the exclusion zone. Journals like it provide a private space for recording thoughts and experiences, a rare but important part in preserving bits of Zone history. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Safety Guide

A well-used safety guide with a tattered cover and dog-eared pages. The guide has information on survival techniques, first aid, and emergency procedures. It appears to be an older edition but can still make for a vital resource to a capable reader. Books and guides are typically found in sleeping quarters and personal hideouts. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Survival Guide

A detailed survival guide with practical advice on enduring tough environments. The pages are filled with tips on shelter building, food foraging, and navigation. The book is worn and has countless annotations in the margins. Books and guides are typically found in sleeping quarters and personal hideouts. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Mechanics Manual

An extensive mechanics manual, covering repair and maintenance of various machines and equipment. The cover has some splatters of oil on it, and the pages are heavily thumbed. The manual provides technical knowledge to a capable reader. Books and guides are typically found in sleeping quarters and personal hideouts. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Lead-Lined Container

An opened metal container, previously used for safely storing radioactive materials. The interior is lined with lead, and the exterior shows significant wear and tear. Due to sustained damage to its casing, the lid can no longer be closed properly. It is not advised to still use it for the storage and transport of anomalous formations. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
SSP-99M Suit Display

A standing display of the SSP-99M suit, a high-end closed breathing protective suit. The 99M model includes advanced environmental protection gear and provides oxygen from a pressurized tank carried on the back. This particular suit is a display model, it shows signs of use but remains visually in good condition. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Soviet Poster (Man)

A color poster, printed on thin glossy paper. It shows a man in red clothes extending his hand towards the viewer. It appears to be from the time of the Soviet Union. The edges are slightly torn and the colors have slightly faded over time. Small pinholes mark the corners, evidence of its previous display. This print appears to have either been removed from an existing place or stored for a long time since its production. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Orange Poster

A color poster, printed on thin glossy paper. It shows black text of a harsh orange backdrop. The edges are slightly torn and the colors have slightly faded over time. Small pinholes mark the corners, evidence of its previous display. This print appears to have either been removed from an existing place or stored for a long time since its production. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
White and Red Poster

A color poster, printed on thin glossy paper. It shows a red motif on a white backdrop with text. The edges are slightly torn and the colors have slightly faded over time. Small pinholes mark the corners, evidence of its previous display. This print appears to have either been removed from an existing place or stored for a long time since its production. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Soviet Poster (Abstract)

A color poster, printed on thin glossy paper. The edges are slightly torn and the colors have slightly faded over time. Small pinholes mark the corners, evidence of its previous display. This print appears to have either been removed from an existing place or stored for a long time since its production. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Infected Poster

A color poster, printed on thin glossy paper. The edges are slightly torn and the colors have slightly faded over time. Small pinholes mark the corners, evidence of its previous display. This print appears to have either been removed from an existing place or stored for a long time since its production. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Blue Head Poster

A color poster, printed on thin glossy paper. The edges are slightly torn and the colors have slightly faded over time. Small pinholes mark the corners, evidence of its previous display. This print appears to have either been removed from an existing place or stored for a long time since its production. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Black and Indigo Poster

A color poster, printed on thin glossy paper. The edges are slightly torn and the colors have slightly faded over time. Small pinholes mark the corners, evidence of its previous display. This print appears to have either been removed from an existing place or stored for a long time since its production. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Sink

A porcelain sink with rusted fixtures and chipped enamel. The basin shows signs of extensive use, with hairline cracks running along the surface. When connected to a working plumbing system, it can be used for washing and adds a touch of practicality to any base. Commonly found in makeshift bathrooms. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Side Table A

A small wooden side table with a single drawer. The wood is darkened with age and has a few scratches and dents. Despite its wear, it is sturdy and functional, suited for holding small items and light sources. They're often placed in personal spaces for both utility and to add a bit of charm. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Side Table B

A compact side table with a simple metal frame and a wooden top. The wood shows signs of wear, with some discoloration and minor scratches. Suited to be placed next to a bed or a reading chair. Adds a touch of functionality and modest style to personal spaces. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Metal Shelves

A set of used metal shelves, slightly rusted but structurally sound. Each shelf provides ample space for storing supplies, tools, or personal items. The industrial design makes it suitable for any workshop or storage area. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Wooden Box

A sturdy wooden box with reinforced corners, commonly used in transportation of heavy items, bulk products intended for resale, or industrial purposes. The lid has exterior damage and the wood shows signs of age. May be used as high capacity storage containers in workshops or personal spaces. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] furniture item
Boar Head Trophy

A mounted boar head, a common big game in the Zone, preserved and displayed on a hand-built wooden plaque. The taxidermy is of good quality, despite the overall weathered look. The wood has some scratches and the fur has some signs of thinning and discoloration, likely due to exposure to the elements. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Chimera Head Trophy

A chimera head mounted on a hand-built wooden plaque, an impressive and fearsome display piece. The head is well-preserved and the overall taxidermy is of good quality, some of the fur show signs of wear, likely caused by packaging and transportation. It is a rare and prized trophy. Often displayed in hideouts as a mark of a significant achievement. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Stuffed Pseudodog Trophy

A stuffed pseudodog, preserved with care to capture its threatening posture, mounted on a wooden base. The taxidermy is of good quality and the creature has been well-preserved, including its sharp teeth and fur. The trophy gives off a reminder of how even the more minor dangers in the Zone can be the sudden end to any careless stalker. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Stuffed Cat Trophy

A stuffed cat, expertly mounted to preserve its fierce expression, mounted on a wooden base. The taxidermy is of good quality, the fur is well-maintained, but some areas show signs of wear. As a trophy, it represents a successful hunt and the dangers faced by its owner. The ferociousness of mutated cats found all around the exclusion zone can still be felt from the display. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Bloodsucker Head Trophy

A mounted bloodsucker head, carefully preserved with a menacing snarl, mounted on a hand-built wooden plaque. The quality of the taxidermy is solid, especially on the individual tendrils, though the skin is slightly discolored from exposure. Preserved bloosucker trophies are a rare decoration in the Zone. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Stuffed Bloodsucker Trophy

A full-body stuffed bloodsucker, mounted in a threatening pose on a wooden base. The preservation is detailed and the taxidermy is of good quality, though the skin shows minor cracking and discoloration. Bloodsucker trophies are a rare and fearsome decoration, capturing the essence of the abomination's deadly nature. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Stuffed Blind Dog Trophy

A stuffed blind dog, preserved in a lifelike stance, mounted on a wooden base. The taxidermy is of good quality, the fur has a smooth and pleasant texture, though some parts are slightly rough and matted, potentially already present when the speciment was still alive. The dog trophy has a looming presence -- even the most common mutant can still be a threat on a bad day. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Stuffed Flesh Trophy

A stuffed flesh, mounted on a wooden base, preserved with a grotesque appearance, including all of its dangly legs. The skin is thick and leathery, with scars all over its body. Flesh trophies are a rare display of the bizarre and dangerous fauna of the Zone, even the less threatening specimens. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Stuffed Boar Trophy

A massive stuffed boar, mounted on a wooden base. It has a high attention to detail and lifelike accuracy, in all of its bulk. The fur is coarse, and the tusks are slightly chipped, showing the boar's age and likely previous encounters with unfortunate rookies. Boar trophies are a rare still life of the rugged nature of the Zone. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Carton Box

A simple carton box, showing signs of wear and tear. The cardboard is creased and the edges have some dents and tears, but it can still be used for storing lightweight items. It is capable of holding up to 20kg. Boxes like it are a common sight in storage areas in faction bases and workshops. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage item
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage storage capacity: 20kg
Microscope

A vintage microscope, with metal casing and glass lenses. The body shows signs of oxidation, and the focusing mechanism is stiff but still functional. Once used for scientific observations, it now serves more as a nostalgic display piece. Ideal for adding a touch of scholarly ambiance to a workspace. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Wall Mounted Map A

A large, wall-mounted map printed on heavy paper and encased in a wooden frame. The map is slightly yellowed, with frayed edges and small tears. It provides a detailed view of a region inside the exclusion zone, potentially useful for strategic planning or as a decorative element. Often found in command centers or study areas. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] decoration item
Wall Mounted Map B

A wall-mounted map on thick paper, bordered by a wooden frame. The map is worn, with some discoloration and minor water damage. It offers a detailed representation of a specific area in the exclusion zone, making it a valuable resource or a decorative piece. Commonly seen in command posts and tactical planning rooms. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:

Grave A

A simple, weathered grave marker made of wood. The surface is etched with inscriptions, some have faded with time. It stands as a solemn reminder of those who have perished. Often found in makeshift cemeteries or memorial sites, often in proximity to major faction bases.

Grave B

A basic wooden grave marker, showing signs of age and wear. The inscriptions are partially eroded, making them difficult to read. They may be repurposed into a new grave for yet another unfortunate soul. It serves as a poignant reminder of those lost to the Zone. Often found in makeshift cemeteries or memorial sites, often in proximity to major faction bases.

A potted anomalous plant, with dry leaves. The plant's origins are unknown, and it seems to thrive without sunlight. It adds an otherworldly accent to personal spaces. Most likely uprooted and potted somewhere in the Pripyat Outskirts.

A large, woven rug with intricate patterns with a classic European design. The fabric is slightly faded and has some tears at the edges, indicating years of prior use. Rugs add warmth and comfort to any personal living and working space. Creates a cozy atmosphere and adds a hint of style to a repurposed abandoned heap of concrete.
